dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4223402N] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: Klaus Steeg [mailto:klaus.steeg@oshointernational.com] Sent: Friday, May 25, 2007 8:30 AM To: Copyright Subject: RE: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4223402N] Copyright Infringement Attached my letter again and a proof of copyrights. Thanks, Klaus Steeg OSHO INTERNATIONAL -----Original Message----- From: Copyright [mailto:copyright@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2007 7:26 PM To: Klaus Steeg Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4223402N] Copyright Infringement Please re-send the below-pasted e-mail since there is no attachment. Sorry for the inconvenience. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2007 9:50 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4223402N] Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Infringement Added by system at Tuesday, May 22 2007 02:41 pm X-MailFrom: klaus.steeg@oshointernational.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue May 22 14:41:49 2007 Received: (qmail 3853 invoked by alias); 22 May 2007 19:41:48 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 3848 invoked from network); 22 May 2007 19:41:46 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 22 May 2007 19:41:46 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 22 May 2007 14:41:45 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 22 May 2007 14:41:45 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from klaus.steeg@oshointernational.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HqaEr-0003Lf-7L for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 22 May 2007 14:41:45 -0500 Received: from osho.net ([66.45.16.228]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from klaus.steeg@oshointernational.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HqaEf-000N1J-J1 for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 22 May 2007 14:41:33 -0500 Received: from KlausPC [66.104.211.74] by osho.net with ESMTP (SMTPD-8.22) id A79A051C; Tue, 22 May 2007 15:42:18 -0400 Return-Receipt-To: "Klaus Steeg" Reply-To: From: "Klaus Steeg" To: , Subject: Copyright Infringement Date: Tue, 22 May 2007 15:40:29 -0400 Organization: OI Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_010D_01C79C87.886C37A0" X-Priority: 1 (Highest) X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 thread-index: AcecqPqnh7WNCc54TBio1CL2Y0OGKA== Importance: High Disposition-Notification-To: "Klaus Steeg" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 22 May 2007 19:41:45.0873 (UTC) FILETIME=[3B205810:01C79CA9] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Please find attached a letter as pdf document. Regards, Klaus Steeg Klaus Steeg OSHO INTERNATIONAL 80 Fifth Avenue, Suite 1004 New York, NY 10011 T. +1.212.475.1822 x 301 - F. +1.212.475.5833 F. +1.212.658.9508 (efax directly) Mobile: +1.347.210.1492 (world) klaus.steeg@oshointernational.com www.osho.com/oshointernational * Please kindly include my previous message when you reply. Thank you.
